description: Use this operation to get details of a specific raster data collection.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the raster data collection.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the raster data collection.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the raster data collection.

nested_items.name: DescriptionPageUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the description page.

nested_items.name: ImageSourceBands
nested_items.description: The list of image source bands in the raster data collection.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the raster data collection.

nested_items.name: SupportedFilters
nested_items.description: The filters supported by the raster data collection.

nested_items.name: Maximum
nested_items.description: The maximum value of the filter.

nested_items.name: Minimum
nested_items.description: The minimum value of the filter.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the filter being used.
